comments:
When exporting Javadoc, the checkbox "Open generated file index in browser" 
doesn't have effect.

In version 3.0M5, if the "Open generated file index in browser" is checked, we 
have the following message at the end of javadoc :

!SESSION nov. 24, 2003 14:16:30.356 --------------------------------------------
java.version=1.4.2
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=fr_FR

file:D:/dev/eclipse/
